scripts.build: bower install && psc --ffi 'bower_components/purescript-*/src/**/*.js' 'bower_components/purescript-*/src/**/*.purs' src/Main.purs && psc-bundle output/*/*.js --module Main --main Main -o output/main.js && cp src/index.html output/
